entry.title: Bitcoin XT Fork
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the possibility of two Satoshis, with one being for Bitcoin XT and the other against it. The conversation then shifts to the compromise of Bitcoin by the powers that be, who may take over the development team. However, the return of the creator, Satoshi, is welcomed by most people, as unanimity is crucial for Bitcoin, and a fork should be avoided until a consensus is reached, even if it takes a long time. It is likely that a fork will occur, resulting in many humiliated people on both sides, leading to bitterness.
